ComicInfo.Penciller: Bernie Krigstein,George Evans,Jack Kamen,Wally Wood,Jack Kamen,Wally Wood,Bernie Krigstein,George Evans
ComicInfo.Writer: Al Feldstein,Carl Wessler,Otto Binder,Bill Gaines,Bill Gaines,Al Feldstein,Otto Binder,Carl Wessler
ComicInfo.Title: The Orphan; The Whipping; You, Murderer; As Ye Sow...
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Orphan: A little girl murders her drunken father and frames her uncaring mother for the crime so that she can go live with her nice aunt.
The Whipping: A community is up in arms when Mexican-Americans move to town and form a vigilante group to deal with them. However, one of the bigots murders his own daughter when she marries a Mexican.
You, Murderer: A story told in second person about the victim a hypnotist picks to do his dirty work for a killing after his wife leaves him for another man.
As Ye Sow...: A husband hires a contract killer to trail his wife and murder the man she meets. The woman reconsiders her affair, decides to call it off, and returns to her husband. The husband is glad to have her back before he remembers what he's done. He sees the figure in the door and the flash of the gun. The last thing he ever hears is his wife begging him not to die.
ComicInfo.Characters: Millie Johnson (Lucy's mother, death),Steve (Millie's love interest, death), (Lucy Johnson (villain, daughter of Sam and Millie),Sam Johnson (Lucy's father, death),Aunt Kate (Millie's sister)
ComicInfo.Inker: Jack Kamen,Wally Wood,Bernie Krigstein,George Evans,Jack Kamen,Wally Wood,Bernie Krigstein,George Evans
